DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomize , single-dose , one-cohort , two-sequence , two-period crossover study healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject ( nonchildbearing potential ) . Evidence personally sign date informed consent document indicate subject inform pertinent aspect study . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , accept placement indwell catheter infusion study procedure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy ) . A positive urine drug screen cocaine , tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) , opiates/opioids , benzodiazepine amphetamine .
